text: Charlotte Goldsmith (born 18 March 1979) is a road cyclist from the United Kingdom. She represented England at the 2006 Commonwealth Games. She also rode for Great Britain at the 2004 and 2005 UCI Road World Championships. ==References== ==External links== * profile at Procyclingstats.com Category:1979 births Category:British female cyclists Category:Living people Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Cyclists at the 2006 Commonwealth Games Category:Commonwealth Games competitors for England
title: Charlotte Goldsmith
